author: trackreco
body:
Remove the commented-out new implementation of prop-to-R that separates parameter and error propagation (as is done in prop-to-plane).

This is a follow-up PR to #43146 where this commit has been lost during the final rebase.

There are no active code changes, just removal of commented out parts.
title: [MkFit] Remove commented-out code, follow up to #43146
